entry.def: To amputate someone's arm or leg means to cut all or part of it off in an operation because it is diseased or badly damaged.

example.ex: To save his life, doctors amputated his legs...
example.tran: 为了挽救他的生命，医生们截掉了他的双腿。

example.ex: He had to have one leg amputated above the knee.
example.tran: 他的一条腿不得不从膝部以上截断。

means.word_mean: 1. a condition of disability resulting from the loss of one or more limbs
2. a surgical removal of all or part of a limb
